description:
When Giroro becomes split into seven distinct selves, the original has to stop the cold-hearted soldier version from hurting his friends and worse. Then, the Occult Club at school is shutting down for lack of members and tangible results. Momoka and Fuyuki enter the first National Middle School Occult Tournament, since victory means saving the club!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, The Man with Seven-Colored Faces / Fuyuki, Serve it On! Frog Meet
L`homme aux sept visages / Le tournoi de la dernière chance
ギロロ 七つの顔の男だぜ であります / 冬樹 盛り上がれ! オカルト大会 であります
